clear.name: clear
clear.description: clears the tts queue for this server

restrict.name: restrict
restrict.description: disable tts for users who aren't muted

unrestrict.name: unrestrict
unrestrict.description: enable tts for users who aren't muted

command.name: command
command.description: the command to get information about

lang.name: lang
lang.description: change the language of the tts for your account

leave.name: leave
leave.description: disconnects the bot from the voice channel

name.name: name
name.description: changes the name for your messages

speed.name: speed
speed.description: change the speed of the tts for your account

on.name: on
on.description: turn on tts for your messages

off.name: off
off.description: turn off tts for your messages

voice.name: voice
voice.description: change the voice for your account
